resources.string: Control your car\u2019s EV charge settings.
Controls which service can bind to OemCarService
Access your car\u2019s vendor channel to exchange car-specific information.
project an interface from a phone on the car\u2019s display
Allows an app to project an interface from a phone on the car\u2019s display.
Allows an app to get the status of other apps projecting to the car\u2019s display.
Allows an app to be notified when its volume is being lowered as a result of other audio playing in the car.
